summary: User asks whether PHP SDK supports timeout settings when waiting for signals in workflows. The question is resolved by pointing to the awaitWithTimeout function.
userImpact: Users need to know the correct API to use when they want to wait for signals with a timeout.
proposedFix: Use awaitWithTimeout function or await with signal and custom timer.
workaround: Use custom timer alongside await with signal.
resolutionDetails: User was directed to use awaitWithTimeout function which provides the requested timeout functionality.
keyQuote: try to use awaitWithTimeout or use await with signal and custom timer
